Returns the parameters the distribution was constructed with.

@1@ Returns the log-mean {{math|m}} distribution parameter. It defines the location of the peak. The default value is {{c|0.0}}.

@2@ Returns the log-deviation {{math|s}} distribution parameter. The default value is {{c|1.0}}.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
@1@ The log-mean {{math|m}} distribution parameter. 

@2@ The log-deviation {{math|s}} distribution parameter.
